definition: to reply (to an accusation)/to defend one's dissertation

sentences.english: The respondent shall not be liable for compensating the injuries for RST.
sentences.chinese: 答辩人对RST伤害赔偿不应承担责任。

sentences.english: It's your turn now to reply to these charges.
sentences.chinese: 现在该轮到你对这些指控进行答辩了。

sentences.english: The firm’s senior executives put up a stronger, clearer defence.
sentences.chinese: 公司的高级主管们表达了更加有力，清楚的答辩。

sentences.english: Give the doctoral student (candidate) an oral examination on his dissertation.
sentences.chinese: 举行博士生论文答辩会。

sentences.english: This is not something he has chosen to do.
sentences.chinese: 他并未选择进行为邦民答辩。

sentences.english: By rights, I think he should have an opportunity to reply to our criticizm.
sentences.chinese: 按理，我认为他应该有对我们的批评进行答辩的权利。

sentences.english: The Petitioner had made or will make proper financial provision for the Respondent.
sentences.chinese: 呈请人已经或将会为答辩人提供妥当的经济援助。

sentences.english: Executives from Solyndra are scheduled to testify before the subcommittee next week.
sentences.chinese: Solyndra高管将于下周在商务委员会前答辩。

sentences.english: When she defended her thesis, she was forced to put this phrase in her thesis.
sentences.chinese: 当她做论文答辩时，她被迫将这说法放入论文里。

sentences.english: Can apply for thesis oral defense?
Speech or reply by the third party and his litigant representative.
sentences.chinese: 第三人及其诉讼代理人发言或者答辩。

sentences.english: Company of strange forest estate did not reply to a charge to front courtyard.
sentences.chinese: 而作为销售商的奇林木业公司未到庭答辩。

sentences.english: Be sure that your reply is consistent with your original argument.
sentences.chinese: 你的答辩应当与自己最初的论点保持一致。

sentences.english: The court extended the defendant's time for serving his defense by fourteen days.
sentences.chinese: 法院把被告送交警答辩状的时间延长了14天。

sentences.english: The failure of the respondent to submit a defence shall not affect the proceeding of the arbitration procedures.
sentences.chinese: 被申请人未提交答辩书的，不影响仲裁程序的进行。

sentences.english: Students who successfully defend their thesis will be awarded a master degree of law.
sentences.chinese: 通过答辩论文，学生可取得中国的法学硕士学位。

definition: examination of the evidence of the opposing party in a court of law
to postpone one's graduation (e.g. by undertaking additional studies) (abbr. for 延後畢業|延后毕业[yan2 hou4 bi4 ye4])
lesson plan/teaching plan/a "missionary case" (a dispute over Christian missionaries during the late Qing)
